heading: HR01672
0: A RESOLUTION OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES EXPRESSING ITS PROFOUND CONDOLENCES TO THE FAMILIES OF THE VICTIMS AND DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON HUMAN RIGHTS AND ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN TO STRONGLY CONDEMN AND CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE DEATH OF THREE (3) CHILDREN IN LIANGA, SURIGAO DEL SUR DUE TO AN EXPLOSION OF AN M203 AMMUNITION OWNED BY THE 75TH IBPA
